Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem!”

Reviews.Content: amazing true hidden gem im pretty people 13 reviews dont spacious apartment kitchen bathroom tall ceilings stunning view venice 3 windows offers free boat shuttle service 5 min zattere 10 minutes san marco nestled tourists services youd expect hotel lot services actually shared neighbouring hilton hotel massive hilton actually own private shuttle boats stop directly outside hotel door free stay residenz feel own private boat taking location service runs 1520 minutes 2 main locations major plus super convenient fridge stocked morning basic breakfast items theres coffee machine illy coffee pads theyve kitchen appliances stay ill definitely recommend venice

HotelInfo.Name: Residenza Grandi Vedute
